    • Method Detail

      • compareImages

        public static double compareImages(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path file1,
                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path file2)
                            throws IOException
        Returns a similarity measure between two images on the scale from 0 to 1. 0 indicates no similarity at all while 1 indicates exact similarity (i.e., the same image). The images are assumed to be generated using Plot of PoltPyramid for NASA data.
        Parameters:
        file1 - - path to the first image
        file2 - - path to the second image
        Returns:
        the similarity measure on a scale from 0 to 1
        Throws:
        IOException - - if an error occurs while loading any of the images
